titles.title: In My Heart There Is A Song

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In my heart there is a song that will not die,
Even through the chilling fear and lonely night.
I'll hold the hope until the end,
That the dawn will bring a day of endless light.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In my heart I sing a song that fills the night.
Even through the weeping hours it gives me light
To hold to the promise of my God,
That he who sows in tears will reap in joy.
